string.value: A dragon asleep in a forest covered in fog... What a strange dream. \r\n\r\nYou feel a bit tired from dreaming about the dragon but #byou should say good morning to your family.#k.

When you tell your Mom about the dream, she says that it's a very interesting dream and that you should share it with #b#p1013101##k, who is in the #b#m100030102##k. Hmm... #p1013101# will probably just laugh at you. Still, you should go tell #p1013101#.
#p1013101# just laughed, saying your dream was stupid. Just as you suspected.
You haven't gone to see #p1013101# yet? I think #p1013101# will find your dream interesting so go tell him about it. #b#p1013101##k is in the #b#m100030102##k.
